verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
VERSE 1:
From rising sun to kingdom come
Your faithful love is unfailing
Through shadows turn and tempests stir
Still You O God are unchanging

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Through every hour
I will recall
All my hope is Jesus

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
Great is Your faithfulness
Great is Your faithfulness
I lift my eyes, I won't forget
How great Your faithfulness

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
VERSE 2:
When battle's near I will not fear
Your promises are unshaken
My faith is sure of nothing more
That Christ alone, my portion

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
BRIDGE:
There'll be a season
For joy and weeping
In everything our God is faithful
A (A/C# 3rd time)
His arms are open
I will come running
Now and always our God is faithful

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
FINAL CHORUS:
Great is Your faithfulness
Great is Your faithfulness
I lift my eyes, I won't forget
How great Your faithfulness
I won't forget Your faithfulness
I won't forget Your faithfulness
